Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: At least the type Iâ€™ve been given at the ER for pill ODs is truly (*truly*) disgusting to drink and it does a number on your digestive system. Quasi-diarrhea-poop with the appearance of tar. Author: junebug-2019
Text: No because the activated charcoal will give you diarrhea as well and will still run the risk of dehydration.  It's great if you take too many tylenol or other drugs but not laxatives.
